page.title: 05ROLLER SKATING
page.content: Sometimes if I'm bored I will call for my friends and go roller skating. Roller boots are ankle length boots with four wheels on each boot.The boots have both got a stopper on the front of each boot so that you can stop or stand still by just putting the stopper down.At the Spa Centre in Leamington there is a roller disco, which is a room with flashing lights and music.I went there once with my brother Nick but he kept on sitting down for a rest.If the ground is bumpy or gritty it is very hard to skate and if you fall over it hurts.
